title: Water Ripples Live Watch Face
summary: Dive into your next vacation! Beautifully animated, brings you inner peace.
description: NOTE: Please make sure your watch is running Android Wear 5.0. The update is rolling out now but may take a few days. Thank you for your patience.Efficiently programmed, doesn't drain your battery!The first Live Wallpaper Watch Face for Wear.Enjoy calming animated water ripples on an ocean background.An update including various analog and digital watch faces as well as a variety of backgrounds will follow soon.Compatible with: LG G Watch, LG G Watch R, Motorola Moto 360, Samsung Gear Live, Sony SmartWatch 3, Asus ZenWatch running Android 5 (Lollipop)
descriptionHTML:
NOTE: Please make sure your watch is running Android Wear 5.0. The update is rolling out now but may take a few days. Thank you for your patience.


Efficiently programmed, doesn't drain your battery!


The first Live Wallpaper Watch Face for Wear.


Enjoy calming animated water ripples on an ocean background.


An update including various analog and digital watch faces as well as a variety of backgrounds will follow soon.


Compatible with: LG G Watch, LG G Watch R, Motorola Moto 360, Samsung Gear Live, Sony SmartWatch 3, Asus ZenWatch running Android 5 (Lollipop)
comments: Font size of digital clock Would be 5 stars if font size can be increased by at least 2 points. Also, please centre the digital clock.
Very promising Very nice looking now. When it gets the customisation options it will be a definite five stars face
Not much options sadly. No battery info etc.. just time.
Time is small. Also no weather information and no date.
Awsome Get some more like these watch faces
It is so cool to see my watch
